titles.title: A bill for the relief of Horace Martin.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in satisfaction of all claims of such individual against the United States arising out of the purchase of real property at a tax sale conducted by the Internal Revenue Service.
